::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
During the time that the old Maximal bases defenses ha=
d slowed Scourge and the Sweeps, Rodimus had put a good amount of distance =
between them. He drove onward, red lining his engine. He was taking a very =
indirect route to the Ark. He was hoping to not cross the Minions again unt=
ill the real battle was apon him.
=A0
He opens a channel to both Perceptor =
and Hydras.
=A0
Rodimus: Dark Rodimus, reporting. I'm in route to Mt. St. H=
illary.

--- On Thu, 7/3/08, supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:=


From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@...>

pg@yahoogroups.com

=A0
> The sh=
ips internal defenses click on. Forcefields seal off the area 
where the Mi=
nions are. Autoguns swing into place and begin to fire.
> =A0
> Rodimus let=
s out a small chuckle. He checks himself over as he 
runs. His signature ma=
sker was still operating but the grenade blast 
had fried his cloaking devi=
ce.
> =A0
> Finall he is coming up on an outer wall. Two rockets later and =

there is just a hole. Rodimus leaps out, transforming to behical 
mode. He=
 lands on all screeching tires. Heading for Mt. St. Hillary.

Inside the sh=
ip Scourge is running to chase down his fleeing prey, 
his weapons at the r=
eady as his face wears a grim look of 
determination. Trailing behind him w=
here four other sweeps running 
like soldiers in lock step with thier comma=
nder. 

They all screech to a stop, Scourge holding up a hand, they looked =

around as they could all feel the sudden a force shield that sprang 
into =
place cutting them off from Rodimus. 

Even as the spun around, standing ba=
ck to back as they surveyed the 
area, guns came alive on the walls and beg=
an to orient on the 
minions, and cut into them with metal cutting fury!!

=
Scourge grunted as the bullets burned into him! Although his armor 
was tou=
gh and designed for heavy combat, even he was not impervious 
to the attack=
s. The sweeps were not doing as well as he was. Two of 
them were cut down =
immidiatly, and the other two were looking worn. 

Looking up down he smile=
d as lubricant leaked from several wounds, 
for he noticed the age of the f=
loors and the walls of this room. This 
ship had been abandoned for quite s=
ome time, and time had not been 
kind to it. The walls were rusting in spot=
s and the floors were not 
much better. The fiasco with the greandes on the=
 level above was 
proof of that!

With a feral gin Scourge pointed his weap=
on upward, "The battle is 
not over yet prey! We are comming for you!!!"

M=
ost ship shields were designed to capture prisoners two 
dimentionally, fow=
ard, back and to the sides, Scourge on the other 
hand was creating a door =
the ship was not prepared to block. With a 
smile he fired his disintergrat=
ion beams upwards, vaporizing the 
upward bulkheads. 

With a leap he and t=
he two remaining sweeps with him leaped into the 
air, shifting into thier =
sleeker, and better masked hunter-seekers 
modes they few upwards, thier we=
apons blasting upwards even as the 
ship attempted to contain fire on them =
as they moved!

Finally, with a terrific explosion, one that sent metal deb=
ris over 
the side of the ship and into the surrounding area, they fairly 
=
errupted from the top of the ship, not too far from where the bridge 
sat. =


Floating in mid air, his sensor scattering armor keeping the ship's 
auto=
guns at bay, now that they were free of the ship enviorns, he 
looked aroun=
d as he assessed the situation. 

Only two of the six sweeps he had brough =
with him had survived, and 
from the looks of things Rodimus had continued =
to flee. Scourge had 
failed, and he knew it. 

"Commander" Scourge's voice=
 crackled across the minion encrypted 
channel, "Rodimus has successfully f=
led the ship and is headed in 
your direction, I failed to destroy him."

A=
fter a pause Cyclonus' calm voice transmitted itself to 
Scourge, "No, your=
 attack on him was a test, his destruction will be 
at MY hand. Had you suc=
ceeded then he would be unworthy of me, like 
all the rest that have faced =
me. It would seem there something of the 
Prime in him after all." 

The vo=
ice of Cyclonus paused for a moment and then continued, "Return 
to my loca=
tion, here you will find a way to redeem yourself."

"Yes." Came Scourge's =
reply, the voice of an mech who had been just 
been given a stay of executi=
on. "I am on my way!"

With that Scourge and the sweeps shot into the air, =
moving swiftly 
and silently in the direction of the ark!

Preston
(Scourge=
 & Sweeps)
